channel.title: Can someone post an OFFLINE version of RS?
channel.description: See, I have 2 computers, one at my mom's, and one at my dads. I'm at my mom's most often, but she doesn't have the internet...But I really like modding RS. If its not impossible, could someone be very helpful and post a link to an offline RS?

item.title: Can someone post an OFFLINE version of RS?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

By this he means a way to download a server while offline?

If so you must download a server on your computer then export it to a flash drive or usb drive. After that remove the drive and plug it into another computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone post an OFFLINE version of RS?

item.title: Can someone post an OFFLINE version of RS?

ummmm. i dunno quite what ur meaning but i think ur maning post a server link? go to server advertisment, theres lots there for u.
